input.sentences: she introduced the speaker very well .
it was clear that everyone had to pay attention | their leaders were all right there .
the speaker was unassuming but captivating .
all in the audience listened intently .
they also quickly wrote down what he said | wanting to remember it later .
output.sentences: We are at a black people convention attended by a diverse group of service men and women.
Three black women address the audience of service persons.
Finally a black man approaches the podium and addresses the audience.
The service people take notes about what's being uttered by the black speakers.
Finally, the service people stand and read their notes out loud.
